member.name: T:addBibTexDatabase.AddFile
member.summary: This add a BibtexFile into the database. Only regular BibTex Entries will be accepted. When the adding is successful a success message will be provided. This message contains the number of added entries in the database. It also provides a sucess message if the Entrie is already in the database. But the entry will not be added into the database. If the entry is not valid an erroy message will be provided. This class uses the Bibtex Parser implemented by Steffen Becker.

member.name: M:addBibTexDatabase.AddFile.#ctor(DBAcesses.DBAcessComponent@)
member.param: A reference on a DBAcessComponent to get aceess to the database.

member.name: M:addBibTexDatabase.AddFile.ComputeResponse(Request.HttpPostRequest)
member.summary: Computes the response message. This message contains the number of added entries in the database. It also provides a sucess message if the Entrie is already in the database. But the entry will not be added into the database. If the entry is not valid an erroy message will be provided.
member.param: The request which content should be added to the database
member.returns: The result of the computation, It contains information for the user.
